name: Coconut Survival (Li Wen Studios)
description:
Coconut Survival is a short 2D platform game that can last between 15 to 20 minutes or more depending on the player.

In this game, the player is a coconut that had to avoid obstacles and danger in a 2D world while finding necessary tools that help it reaches the golden flag of pride.

Be aware of the obstacles, as some are more difficult to avoid than others.
